price: Àti pé Allāhu fẹ́ gba ìronúpìwàdà yín. Àwọn tó sì ń tẹ̀lé ìfẹ́-adùn ara sì ń fẹ́ kí ẹ yẹ̀ kúrò (nínú ẹ̀sìn) ní yíyẹ̀ tó tóbi pátápátá.
arabic: وَٱللَّهُ يُرِيدُ أَن يَتُوبَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَيُرِيدُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَتَّبِعُونَ ٱلشَّهَوَٰتِ أَن تَمِيلُواْ مَيۡلًا عَظِيمٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wal-lahu yurīdu an yatūba ʿalaykum wayurīdu alladhīna yattabiʿūna al-shahawāti an tamīlū maylan ʿaẓīman
